mapper.select: SELECT P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, M.ID, R.STATUS, P.NO FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_ROLE_LIST L ON L.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE (R.REF_PRJ_NO, R.REGIST_DATE) IN ( SELECT R.REF_PRJ_NO, MAX(R.REGIST_DATE) FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R GROUP BY R.REF_PRJ_NO ) AND R.STATUS = 'SCREENING' AND L.REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 2 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 3 )

SELECT P.TITLE, R.CONTENT, M.ID, R.STATUS, P.NO FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_ROLE_LIST L ON L.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE (R.REF_PRJ_NO, R.REGIST_DATE) IN ( SELECT R.REF_PRJ_NO, MAX(R.REGIST_DATE) FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R GROUP BY R.REF_PRJ_NO ) AND R.STATUS = 'REJECTED' AND L.REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 2 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 3 )

SELECT P.TITLE, R.CONTENT, M.ID, R.STATUS, P.NO FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_ROLE_LIST L ON L.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE (R.REF_PRJ_NO, R.REGIST_DATE) IN ( SELECT R.REF_PRJ_NO, MAX(R.REGIST_DATE) FROM TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R GROUP BY R.REF_PRJ_NO ) AND R.STATUS = 'PROCESSING' AND L.REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 2 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 3 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS (NO, REGIST_DATE, STATUS, CONTENT, REF_PRJ_NO) SELECT SEQ_TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS_NO.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, 'PROCESSING', '상품이 승인되었습니다.', ( SELECT P.NO FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE R.STATUS ='SCREENING' AND M.ID = #{sellerId} AND P.NO = #{projectNo} ) FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS (NO, REGIST_DATE, STATUS, CONTENT, REF_PRJ_NO) SELECT SEQ_TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS_NO.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, 'REJECTED', #{reasonText}, ( SELECT P.NO FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE R.STATUS ='SCREENING' AND M.ID = #{sellerId} AND P.NO = #{projectNo} ) FROM DUAL
